query: atrial fibrillation guidelines ESC AHA CCS amiodarone beta-blockers recommendations clinical practice first-line therapy
title: Practical guidance for management of atrial fibrillation in sports cardiology
authors: Andrea Palermi, Lorenzo Vilhelm Molinari, Fabrizio Ricci, Sabina Gallina, Giulia Renda
reference: Palermi, A., Molinari, L. V., Ricci, F., Gallina, S., & Renda, G. (2025). Practical guidance for management of atrial fibrillation in sports cardiology. Current Problems in Cardiology, 50(4), 102995. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cpcardiol.2025.102995
